description:
Download Fandango - the #1 movie ticketing app. Get the latest movie times, guarantee tickets, and check out exclusive Fandango content – all at your fingertips. 

New in 6.2:  
•	Introducing the NEW Fandango Message Box! Let us help you stay informed and in the know with our new Messages feature 
•	Stay organized: Keep track and read your Fandango messages directly from the app 
•	Stay connected: Receive an alert when a notification comes through for your purchases, movie updates + news, exclusives, special offers and more

Spotlight: 
•	Get more out of your Fandango experience with the enhanced Spotlight section featuring new movie and content cards, as well as a new rating system and ticketing information icons
Browse Movies:
•	Filter movies by genre, MPAA rating & format, including IMAX & 3D 
•	Watch high-quality trailers, exclusive interviews & browse movie photos
•	Read Fandango fan ratings & reviews and movie scores from Metacritic
•	View the most accurate movie times, MPAA ratings, synopses, run times & director & cast lists

Find Theaters:
•	New ticketing information icons for faster, easier searching
•	Add theaters to a Favorites list for faster searching
•	Find theaters using the iOS location feature, view them in a list or map and get directions 
•	Find theater amenities (Reserved Seating, Mobile Ticket, etc.) 

Purchase Tickets:
•	Sign up for a free Fandango account from the app for faster checkout, access to purchase history and ticket details for upcoming shows 
•	Heading to the movies now? Simply tap GoNow, find a movie at your local theater, make your purchase and enjoy the show
•	Add your Mobile Ticket to Passbook (look for the Mobile Ticket icon to find participating theaters; iPhone/iPod Touch iOS 6+ only) 
•	Go straight to the ticket-taker to have your device scanned with Mobile Ticket (Participating theaters only; look for the Mobile Ticket icon) 

Share + Sync:
•	Feeling social? Sign in to your Fandango account using Facebook or Google+. Don’t have an account? Sign up to receive insider updates (including special offers, movie news and exclusive content), faster checkout and to save your favorite theaters
•	Let the world know what you think! Rate + Review movies from the app and share with other Fandango users via Facebook, Twitter and Google+ 
•	No matter which device you use, you can access saved credit cards, purchase history, ticket details, theater loyalty cards, Favorite Theaters and My Movies each time you sign in to your Fandango account

Extras for iPad:
•	Tap in to The Pulse for a snapshot of what’s selling on Fandango
•	Scroll through photos & videos and view them in full screen – all optimized for iPad’s retina display
By downloading, installing and using this App, you agree to Fandango’s Privacy Policy (http://www.fandango.com/PrivacyPolicy.aspx) 
Terms of Use (http://www.fandango.com/TermsOfUse.aspx) and 
Purchase Policy (http://www.fandango.com/PurchasePolicy.aspx)

We want to hear from you!
Send suggestions and report issues to: iphoneappcomments@fandango.com
